methods: abstract void performBackup(ParcelFileDescriptor oldState, BackupDataOutput data, ParcelFileDescriptor newState) Based on oldState, determine what application content needs to be backed up, write it to data, and fill in newState with the complete state as it exists now.
abstract void restoreEntity(BackupDataInputStream data) Called by BackupAgentHelper to restore a single entity from the restore data set.

abstract void writeNewStateDescription(ParcelFileDescriptor newState) Called by BackupAgentHelper after a restore operation to write the backup state file corresponding to the data as processed by the helper.
